    RecipientDAO - Interface in dataaccesslayer
    This interface holds all the need to implement methods for RecipientDAOImpl
    RecipientDAOImpl - Class in dataaccesslayer.impl
    This class implements RecipientDAO and contains all the implementations to the methods
    RecipientDAOImpl() - Constructor for class dataaccesslayer.impl.RecipientDAOImpl
    When a recipientDAO is created, create a connection to the database to be able to use the methods.
